title: 42 Dr. Guy Winch: The Science Behind Healing Emotional Injury
description:
After 5 months of intensive study into emotional intelligence, I've not found a greater way to develop entrepreneurial and business mindset. This week on the School of Greatness I go in-depth with a leader in research into the effects of emotional damage.
Our next guest is a licensed psychologist, speaker and author. He provides a definitive guide to preparing and healing from emotional injury. Please welcome the author of Emotional First Aid, Dr. Guy Winch.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
